====== DESCRIPTION ======

Contested Spaces: 2019 Harnett Biennial of American Prints is the twelfth competitive national exhibition organized by the University of Richmond Museums. Submissions are encouraged by artists addressing the topic of â€œcontested spacesâ€ from both content and aesthetic perspectives. The theme provides an opportunity for artists to focus on their own understandings of â€œcontested spacesâ€ with a variety of interpretations, styles, and techniques. Open to all forms of prints, the exhibition is presented as a celebration and examination of contemporary printmaking by artists from throughout the United States. The Harnett Biennial will be on view from October 22 to December 6, 2019, in the Joel and Lila Harnett Museum of Art, University Museums.


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

All entries must be submitted through https://artist.callforentry.org
